sentences.en: All this was just designed to frighten me and keep me in line.
sentences.cn: 所有这一切不过是设计好了来恐吓我、让我乖乖听话的。

sentences.en: Computers used to frighten me, but not now.
sentences.cn: 电脑过去让我感到害怕，但现在不了。

sentences.en: Don't frighten me. He is telling the truth.
sentences.cn: 不要吓我, 他说的是真的.

sentences.en: Don't put your prices too high or you'll frighten the customers off.
sentences.cn: 不要把价格提得太高,要不会把顾客吓跑的.

sentences.en: Don’t stand so near the edge! You’re frightening me.
sentences.cn: 别站得那么靠边！你要把我吓坏了。

sentences.en: Dummy patrol cars will be set up beside motorways to frighten speeding motorists.
sentences.cn: 高速公路旁将安装仿真巡逻车以威慑那些超速驾车者。

sentences.en: Fairground rides are intended to frighten the life out of you.
sentences.cn: 露天游乐场的飞车就是想把人吓丢了魂儿。

sentences.en: He knew that Soli was trying to frighten him, so he smiled to hide his fear.
sentences.cn: 他知道索利是想吓唬他，所以他挤出笑容掩饰自己的恐惧。

sentences.en: He tried to frighten me by showing me a knife.
He was a bully. He tried to frighten people into doing what he wanted.
sentences.cn: 他恃强欺弱，总是想吓得人们按他的意愿做事。

sentences.en: He was the cat they captured to frighten the monkey.
sentences.cn: 他们抓住他是为了吓唬别人.

sentences.en: He would never frighten anyone or cause them any harm .
sentences.cn: 他永远不会吓唬或伤害任何人。

sentences.en: I did not want to frighten or distress the horse.
sentences.cn: 我并不想吓到马或惹怒它。

sentences.en: No enemy can frighten us into submission.
sentences.cn: 任何敌人的恐吓都不能使我们屈服.

sentences.en: She was frightened by the anger in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 她被他眼中的怒火吓住了。

sentences.en: They were evidently trying to frighten the public into obedience.
sentences.cn: 很明显,他们是要吓唬众人服从.

sentences.en: We all love to frighten the pants off ourselves by going on hair-raising rides at funfairs.
sentences.cn: 我们都喜欢乘坐游乐场那些让人毛发直竖的游乐设施，把自己吓得魂不附体。

sentences.en: You'll find that I don't frighten easily.
sentences.cn: 你会发现我不是轻易就会害怕的.
